ðŸ“– Summary: Milvus is a high-performance, cloud-native vector database designed for scalable vector ANN search. It excels at organizing and searching large volumes of unstructured data, supporting various AI applications. Milvus offers features like hardware acceleration, distributed architecture, real-time updates, and a lightweight Python version for quick starts.
